trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref:System.String> to and from instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref:System.String>的執行個體，以及<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This class is typically only utilized by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization purposes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別通常只能使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>進行序列化。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Converters.TransformValueSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Converters.TransformValueSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines if conversion from a given <xref:System.String> to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref> is possible.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否轉換從給定<xref:System.String>的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref>可能。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: String to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要評估以進行轉換的字串。

trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。
